briefTitle: Comparative Study of Modified Release (MR) Tacrolimus/Mycophenolate Mofetil (MMF) in de Novo Kidney Transplant Recipients
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Open-Label, Comparative, Multi-Center Study to Assess the Safety and Efficacy of Prograf (Tacrolimus)/MMF, Modified Release (MR) Tacrolimus/MMF and Neoral (Cyclosporine)/MMF in de Novo Kidney Transplant Recipients

interventions.name: Tacrolimus Modified Release (MR)
otherNames: Advagraf, FK506, FKMR, MR4, Astagraf XL

summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and efficacy of tacrolimus/mycophenolate mofetil (MMF), cyclosporine/MMF and tacrolimus modified release/MMF in de novo kidney transplant recipients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Efficacy Failure
